channel.title: hl2.exe nodisk crash
channel.description: Anytime I try to start up the game it keeps telling me that there is no disk in device and will start flashing spazmatickly it has gotten to the point that I'm start to think that the program is just a strobe light can anyone give a hint of whats going wrong?

item.title: hl2.exe nodisk crash
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Oh. Have you verified the SDK Base files then?

Read full topic

item.title: hl2.exe nodisk crash
item.dc:creator: gotgass
item.description:
I tryed that hl2 plays fine I’m talking about black mesa it’s the Source SDK Base 2007 hl2.exe file thats giveing me the problems.

Read full topic

item.title: hl2.exe nodisk crash
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Well, that’s weird that is asking for a disk.

You can always try to verify the files. Right click on the HL2 entry on your Steam games list, go to properties, go to local files tab and click on verify integrity of game cache.

Read full topic

item.title: hl2.exe nodisk crash
item.dc:creator: gotgass
item.description:
yes it is steam and it is legal copy of half-life 2
